instructions: This is a Cairo/Starknet project. Focus on smart contract security, felt252 type safety, storage optimization, proper use of Starknet decorators (#[starknet::contract], #[storage], #[event], #[abi(embed_v0)]), and Cairo-specific patterns. Flag any potential reentrancy, access control, or overflow issues. Ensure tests cover edge cases and failure paths.

rules.rule: All external functions in Starknet contracts must have proper access control checks. Flag any external/public function missing authorization validation.
State-changing functions must emit events. Flag any function that modifies storage but does not emit an event.
Use descriptive error messages in assert statements and custom errors. Do not use bare assert without a message.
Every public function should have corresponding test cases covering both success and failure paths.
Do not hardcode contract addresses or keys. Use configuration or constructor parameters instead.
